DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find correlation high risk OSA ( obstructive sleep apnea ) patient , base Stop-bang screen tool preeclampsia
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between Preeclampsia Positive Obstructive Sleep Apnea Screening Test : STOPBANG Questionnaire
DOC.detailed_description: Obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) associate preeclampsia intrauterine growth retardation ( IUGR ) . Since gold standard diagnosis OSA polysomnogram limit cost availability . Therefore , various screening tool propose order identify high risk OSA patient Stop-bang questionnaire . From previous study , Stop-bang show high predictive performance score equal high 3 determines high risk OSA .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman schedule cesarean delivery admit antepartum unit Ramathibodi hospital Age < 18 year old Previous diagnose OSA Patients use continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) bilevel positive airway pressure ( BiPAP ) fro OSA treatment
